definitions.definition: An engineer or scientist , especially one engaged in technological or military research .
definitions.label_groups: Australia , New Zealand , British , Ireland , informal

definitions.definition: A person with specialized knowledge or skills , especially one who is socially awkward .
definitions.label_groups: Australia , New Zealand , British , Ireland , informal , by extension

main_definition: ( Australia , New Zealand , British , Ireland , informal ) An engineer or scientist , especially one engaged in technological or military research . [from 1930s]
secondary_definitions: ( Australia , New Zealand , British , Ireland , informal , by extension ) A person with specialized knowledge or skills , especially one who is socially awkward .
